channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Half a dozen drains blocked due to mud coming down road, 9th January
item.description:
All of the drains on the road outside Rockfield Business Park are blocked up with mud. This means rain is not draining away and is causing access issues to the industrial estate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17-41, Old Station Drive, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Main Path, Tewkesbury

item.title: Road surface broken down over wide area, 9th January
item.description:
See photo. Outside 43 Whittington Road. This area needs resurfacing. Also warning signs as in the rain the potholes become invisible due to standing water.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Whittington Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Serious pothole, 9th January
item.description:
In Brockhampton lane, coming from the GE end, just after passing the 30 mile limit signs on the left side, a very bad pothole. There is a group of potholes just there but that one is partially bad.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockhampton Lane, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 9th January
item.description:
RTC - vehicle YJ15 UOK - damaged the barriers - Police ref 504 08/01/2025

item.title: Photo taken at 3pm with only light drizzle. No significant rain in last hours and pooling water., 8th January
item.description:
Under steam train bridge in Station Road, Bishops Cleeve. Next to very narrow pathway which a main pathway for school children. Pooling water has worsened over the last few weeks. Extremely dangerous during school drop off/pick up time for children on foot as car splashes through pooling water go about 2 to 3 meters high submerging path.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is prone to blocking and flooding., 8th January
item.description:
The drain outside 43 is blocked on the main road. It's prone to flooding and blocking the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Old Bath Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 8th January

item.title: Another pot hole on the bridge, 8th January
item.description:
On the top of the railway bridge. It's clear there have been multiple potholes and attempts to fix them but there's a new one today. Please can someone fix them properly. Because it's on the bridge you can't avoid it!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes on both sides of road, 8th January
item.description:
Potholes of varying sizes along both sides of north road west and several in the centre further up closer to the community centre. Too many to individually mark. Need surveying asap as you need to weave from side to side to avoid them
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Road West, Golden Valley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very large pothole on side of road, 8th January
item.description:
The pothole is approximately half way between the house and the farm on opposite side of road. Very large and getting bigger
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain blocked, 8th January
item.description:
Drain in Clarence Road near pittville gates, left hand side with traffic flow. This drain has been blocked for sometime and within 20 minutes of rain, flooding occurs on the road. This has been reported a number of times, so really needs attention to avoid serious damage to property.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clarence Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Queen's Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 8th January
item.description:
Overhanging of trees on private property obstructing the street lights on the pavement related to ref 70002396 (streetlighting have requested for AHR investigate, possible hedge/tree letter)
